duties_responsibilities.duty: Transport goods and supplies onsite and offsite, ensuring on-time delivery and safe transportation.
Visually inspect loaded trucks to ensure orders are packaged, shipped, and loaded properly to avoid damages during transportation.
Report defects or equipment problems, work according to an assigned schedule, and provide professional and courteous interactions with customers.
File and retrieve documents, monitor inventory availability, and follow mandatory work instructions to safeguard the environment and wellbeing of oneself and others.
Operate various equipment and machines, adjusting variables to achieve efficiency, and assist with various warehouse duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED preferred.
